department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Inspector and maintenance of generator sets at Mont-Joli, Quebec.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of Inspection and maintenance of generator sets at IML (Institut Maurice-Lamontagne) at Mont-Joli, Quebec. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
